structure.unit: ARTICLE III. CITY OF MIAMI MINIMUM HOUSING STANDARDS

text.section:
Sec. 17-69. Repeal clause.
This article is intended and shall be construed as constituting minimum standards for the City of Miami. To the extent of the minimum housing standards herein provided, all County and municipal ordinances, County and municipal resolutions, municipal charters, special laws applying only to Miami-Dade County or any general law which the County Commission is authorized by the Constitution to supersede, nullify or amend, and any part of any such ordinance, resolution, charter, or law in conflict with or inconsistent with the minimum housing standards herein established, are hereby repealed and superseded except as authorized by of this article.
